name: Fern's Tuna Casserole
author: dgjert
summary: Nothing fancy here, but really great comfort food from my husband's Grandma. Good old tuna casserole with potato chips on top.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 slices processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)
½ cup crushed potato chips, or as needed
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine mushroom soup, milk, and tuna in a saucepan over medium heat; cook until well blended and warmed through, about 5 minutes
Pour mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish; add noodles and mix well
Top noodles with cheese food and sprinkle potato chips over cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling, 30 to 45 minutes
